SELECT * FROM PDSCI.SYS_USER SU WHERE EXISTS (SELECT NULL FROM PDSCI.SRM_EXPERT_PROJ SEP WHERE SEP.RECORD_STATUS='Y' AND SEP.USER_FLOW=SU.USER_FLOW
AND SEP.PROJ_FLOW = '${projFlow}'
AND SEP.EVAL_SET_FLOW = '${evalSetFlow}'
)

SELECT SEP.EXPERT_PROJ_FLOW , SEP.PROJ_FLOW , SEP.USER_FLOW , SEP.EMAIL_NOTIFY_FLAG , SEP.PHONE_NOTIFY_FLAG , SEP.FEEDBACK_INFO , SEP.AGREE_FLAG , SEP.SCORE_TOTAL , SEP.SCORE_RESULT_ID , SEP.SCORE_RESULT_NAME , SEP.EXPERT_OPINION , SEP.EVAL_SET_FLOW , SEP.EVAL_STATUS_ID , SEP.EVAL_STATUS_NAME , SU.USER_NAME FROM PDSCI.SRM_EXPERT_PROJ SEP , PDSCI.SYS_USER SU WHERE SEP.USER_FLOW=SU.USER_FLOW AND SEP.RECORD_STATUS='Y'
AND SEP.PROJ_FLOW = '${projFlow}'
AND SEP.EVAL_SET_FLOW = '${evalSetFlow}'
AND SEP.EVAL_STATUS_ID = '${evalStatusId}'
